MASTER_PAD_VERSION_INFO.MASTER_PAD_INFO: Portable Application Description, or PAD for short, is a data set that is used by shareware authors to disseminate information to anyone interested in their software products. To find out more go to http://www.asp-shareware.org/pad

RoboSoft.Company_Description:
Dynamic Applications is a small business consultancy focused on product cost, efficiency, sales, and net profit. We support Startups in developing 21st century Business Models. Your very own.
We're driven by thousands of independent voters. Altogether, we develop Perfect Desire, an evolving platform of free and simple business plan calculators for everyone.
At Dynamic Applications, we are Sharing Economy. Follow us to gain. We vote in online democracy, we deliver for free. We work for you, and we call them Dynamic Applications.
RoboSoft.Comments_For_Reviewer:
Pirate Desire is functional equivalent to our Professional Business Model Development platform. it's free, and it's supposed to bring additional imagery, music, flags and icons over time.
it's a proof-of-concept.
Your reviews are our inspiration. Thank you for supporting Dynamic Applications.

NewsFeed.NewsFeed_DESCRIPTION: This PAD extension allows you to add your RSS and Atom news feeds info into your PAD file. This info can be used by RSS feed submission software or by feed directories themselves.

OnlineShops.OnlineShops_DESCRIPTION: This PAD extension allows you to check these sites distribution agreements and decide wether you wish to sell your product through them

Site.Site_DESCRIPTION: This PAD extension allows you to add your site info into your PAD file. This info can be used by site submission software or by web directories themselves.

Transparency. Privacy Protection. and Participation. our values.

English.Char_Desc_2000:
Transparency. Privacy protection. and Participation. our values.
Revolution.
Pirate Desire can project any kind of calculation in x / y / t, and it can integrate over time. Select your Target. Check your Options. Build your own Ship. contribute. and grow. be successful. Vote.
Pirate Desire contains a wide range of simulation models for the 21st century founder, from a Bakery Tutorial, to Simulation Models for specific purposes like, Water Supply, Apple Tree, a Tool Builder calculation model, Small Busines Developments, the 21st century Truck Driver, an Internet of Things developer simulation, and even a realistic Photovoltaic System cost/profit calculation over 25..40 years.
Transparency. Privacy Protection. and Participation. our values.
1) All simulations that you develop will be fully transparent, through automated interactive ToolTips. 2) It's protecting your Privacy, by gathering no data at all. It's your business, it's your data. We respect that.
3) The third thing to know is that it's Participative. Customer Driven Development: vote in the Dynamic Idea and Roadmap Competition on Twitter, and define the next big thing we publish. Pay with a Tweet.
Pirate Desire is the fully functional Business Model Development Environment of Dynamic Applications, in a special version that will destroy itself on day 100. But our secret Treasure Code will guide you on your way, right from its final Startup day. For those who can not wait that long, Pirate Desire will upgrade itself and activate all features and capabilities of Perfect Desire, our infinite Target, from having acquired 1000 dna coins in an honest and righteous way.
Pirate Desire. Celebrating 2018, the third year of Dynamic Applications, this one is gonna be free of charge. One coin for Startup, one coin per Simulation Model, 2 dna coins for calling our Website from Program's menu.
We are Dynamic Applications. We work to empower people. We are Sharing Economy. Follow us to gain.
